GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
dmaengine: sf-pdma: Add multithread support for a DMA channel

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit a93b3f1e11971a91b6441b6d47488f4492cc113f, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit 6973886ad58e6b4988813331abb76ae0b364a9c2. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: dmaengine: sf-pdma: Add multithread support for a DMA channel
